Most of the information can be found in the [Home](index.html) page or 
[syllabus](syllabus.html). But here are some interesting facts about the
website!

- This website was created using [R Markdown for Websites](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/rmarkdown_websites.html), 
developed on [GitHub](https://github.com/) and hosted for free using 
[GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com)
- The content on our site is [licensed](LICENSE.html) using CC-BY, meaning you
can use use and reuse the lesson content without restriction, as long as you
cite the website!
